title: Regression: `quarkus-test-oidc-server` tries to start the dev services since 3.13.0
body:
### Describe the bug

We are using [quarkus-test-oidc-server](https://quarkus.io/guides/security-oidc-code-flow-authentication#code-flow-integration-testing-wiremock) to mock an OIDC Provider in our tests. Since Quarkus 3.13.0 the dev services for keyckoak are started instead of the mocked service. Quarkus 3.12.3 works fine.

```
2024-08-01 19:55:26,075 ERROR [org.tes.doc.DockerClientProviderStrategy] (build-114) Could not find a valid Docker environment. Please check configuration. Attempted configurations were:
As no valid configuration was found, execution cannot continue.
See https://java.testcontainers.org/on_failure.html for more details.
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

[reproducer.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/16460312/reproducer.zip)

`./mvnw test`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

Java 21

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.13.0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven

### Additional information

_No response_
